Wiki¶

Valuetypes¶

Standard value types, which are default part of the ODMF database schema.

Valuetype Code Description
Metre 3 Describes length

TBD.

Access Levels¶

List of all access levels that can be assigned to a user role.

Role name Integer code Description
Guest 0 tbd
Logger 1 tbd
Editor 2 tbd
Supervisor 3 tbd
Admin 4 tbd

End.
